description: Corrections on the guitar solo (Lots of details+getting some triplet feel where it belongs. Also had to change the instrument to overdriven guitar to get the necessary sustain on the long bends) and the bass track (minor details), using isolated tracks (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xsWDIBCuB1I and https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vI_NQntb02U).
title: Another Brick In The Wall (Part 2)

title: Another Brick In The Wall (Part 2)
